text: Soni achakongwe ŵajumu (ligongo lya uchekulu) aŵala ŵangakwembecheya kulombedwa, basi chipaŵe pangali ulemwa kukwao kuliunukula nguo syao (syapachanya) nambo mwangali kulosya ipeto (yankati mpela nkufu ibangili ni ine). Nambo naga ali atite aligose (ni kuleka kuliunukula nguo syao syapachanya) mpaka iŵe yambone nnope kukwao. Sano Allah ni Jwakupikanichisya, Jwakumanyilila nnope
